title: Interpretation of a dream about escaping drowning in a river in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about surviving drowning in a river in a dream. When the dreamer sees himself being saved from drowning in the river, he can express justice, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees salvation from drowning, it can lead to repentance of sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees being saved from drowning, This may be a sign of paying off debts, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about drowning in water and emerging from it in a dream could be a sign of recovery from an illness, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself drowning in water and emerging from it, this It can lead to getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is emerging from water, this may be a sign that she is getting rid of crises, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees He drowns himself without consequence or danger, as this may lead to goodness, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a single woman is the correct and complete interpretation

preview.html: The encyclopedia is presented in the following article. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a single woman, with all the details that she sees in this dream. It is a type of precious metal with high value and high price, which represents the love of all women, especially when they attend events and parties. Gold is not extracted in the state in which it reaches our hands, but rather It is polished and manufactured to create different types and shapes among ornaments such as rings, earrings, pendants, chains, bracelets, etc. A single woman during her sleep. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a single woman. Here in the following points are the interpretations of the great scholar Ibn Sirin in this dream: When an unmarried woman sees that she is buying gold, this portends happiness and hearing good news in the near future by the command of God Almighty. It indicates The success and progress of her studies and the future of her work. Wearing gold in a dream means that you will attain a prestigious position and gain respect and appreciation from those involved in it and those around you. One of the clear indications of an unmarried woman’s vision is that there is someone giving her gold, which is the approach of marrying a well-to-do young man with whom she will live in prosperity. And satisfaction. While seeing a lot of gold coins symbolizes obtaining a lot of livelihood without effort, such as inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about white gold in a dream for a single woman. It is known that in gold it is bright yellow, but there is one type of white that a woman can see in Her sleep, and we will present the indicators of her vision in the following points: It is better to see white gold in a dream than to see yellow gold, but it represents the ultimate sustenance and happy news that brings joy to the dreamer’s life and heart. It indicates marriage to a young man whom she dreamed of marrying. Bushra pledges to accept invitations and achieve What she wanted and expanded in academic and practical reality. Interpretation of dreams of a gift of gold for a single woman. In the following points we present the interpretation of gold in a dream for a single woman: This dream indicates that she will meet a loved one whom she has not seen for a long time. It indicates a connection with a young man of high standing and status. Giving her gold From a relative, it symbolizes her family receiving good news, and God knows best. Counterfeit gold in a dream for a single woman. This vision is one of the unwanted visions that portends the appearance of things that cause grief to the viewer, which we will explain in the following paragraph: It indicates intercourse with a young man who deceives her with love and social status, and he is in Reality is far from it. It symbolizes the failure to achieve the cherished desire that he so desperately wanted to achieve, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was wearing gold bracelets. Many women are looking for an interpretation of dreams to wear gold bracelets in a dream. Here are the most important things that appeared according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretations that answer the questions that were raised about the dream that I was wearing gold bracelets in the dream, so what are their meanings? We study this as follows: Seeing a married woman wearing golden gouache is considered one of the good dreams that bring good news. It is one of the dreams that heralds good news for a woman.

title: Interpretation of Surat Al-Asr in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of Surat Al-Asr in a dream. The Holy Qur’an is full of many Quranic surahs that have many meanings, and through our distinguished and favorite website today we will learn about all the details related to it, so follow us and stay with us for more information. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Asr in a dream. Seeing reciting or hearing Surat Al-Asr in the dreamer. In the dream, it expresses freedom from the sorrows and worries that plague his life. Seeing the dreamer reciting Surat Al-Asr in the dream also expresses help in reality, success, enjoying patience, and gaining a lot of livelihood after receiving many material losses. Seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Asr in the dreamer’s dream is clear evidence of change. The positive in the situation is going for the better, God willing. Seeing Surat Al-Asr recited in a sweet voice for the dreamer of the vision indicates God’s desire to offer him a sacrifice soon. Seeing Surat Al-Asr in the dream of the unmarried dreamer portends a high-ranking family and a new home. Interpretation of seeing Surat Asr in an unmarried girl’s dream: Seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Asr in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will achieve her goals, ambitions, or aspirations. If an unmarried girl recites Surat Al-Asr in a dream, this indicates her speedy recovery, God willing, from all ailments or ailments. If an unmarried girl sees Someone you know is reading Surat Al-Asr in a dream, this indicates that she is approaching the date of engagement, engagement, or marriage with the person she loves, desires, and wants to marry. Seeing Surat Al-Asr in an unmarried girl’s dream means the arrival of many good and abundant halal foods. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Asr in A married woman’s dream: Seeing Surat Al-Asr in a married woman’s dream means that God pleases her. If a married woman reads Surat Al-Asr in a dream, this indicates many miracles and wonders that she will experience. If a married woman reads Surat Al-Asr for her children in a dream, this indicates the necessity of sacrificing an animal. Which God has commanded to be slaughtered. Seeing Surat Al-Asr in a married woman’s dream is clear evidence of her closeness to God Almighty, her righteousness, and her piety. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Asr in a pregnant woman’s dreamSeeing Surat Al-Asr in a pregnant woman’s dream means that joy and happiness will soon arrive in her life, God willing. Seeing hearing Surah recited The afternoon prayer in a pregnant woman’s dream is answered. Seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Asr in a pregnant woman’s dream means the arrival of much happiness, blessings and goodness soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Asr in a man’s dreamSeeing the recitation of Surat Al-Asr in the dreamer’s vision heralds the arrival of much food, goodness and blessings. In a way In general, seeing Surat Al-Asr recited in the dreamer’s vision expresses a positive change in circumstances for the better. Seeing Surat Al-Asr in the dreamer’s vision is clear evidence of a quick recovery from any illness or illness. Seeing Surat Al-Asr recited for the dreamer in the vision confirms that he will soon hear a lot of good news. And the good that will bring him a lot of happiness, joy and good news. Seeing Surat Al-Asr in the dreamer’s vision portends many blessings and blessings in the future.

title: Interpretation of seeing short hair in a dream about another person, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing short hair in a dream about another person, according to Ibn Sirin. For a woman, hair represents two-thirds of her beauty and shows her first beauty. Some women want long hair and some want short hair. Scientists have proven that visions in dreams are events that a person can see or think about repeatedly. If a woman or girl sees a haircut she likes in a dream, it is because she thinks about it a lot or because she sees it on others, so in this article we will learn about the interpretation of seeing short hair in a dream. Other than Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing someone else’s short hair in a dream. Scientists and psychologists agreed that seeing short hair in a dream means failure in life. Pursuing it has no benefit or gain, and the person has not achieved his goals. But at the same time, it does not only indicate this, but It also refers to a person's soul, spirit, and the feeling that always prevails in him. Therefore, if you see in a dream that there is a member of your family whose hair has become short, this means that this person is broken from the inside. He suffers from many problems that he does not know how to escape from and this dream could be a signal To help him. Because he does not know how to ask you for help, but he really wants it inside. Also, you may be the one who dreamed about him without the rest of the family members because there is a greater and deeper relationship between you and that person. So you feel problems inside you and a feeling of sadness and imbalance. As for the one who sees in His dream is that one of his family members or friends appeared with short hair scattered with white locks. He is playing with these locks and is happy and cheerful, because the interpretation of seeing short hair in a dream is for another person. Here it represents the good news that this person will receive, which in turn will lead him to a stage of psychological peace. He has waited a long time and has finally reached the stage of stability, so this dream may also indicate. This person should get married soon, especially if he is young. As for whoever sees in a dream that a person takes his opinion on long and short hair, this means that that person stands at A crossroads. He does not know which path to take and turns to the dreamer to be his guide, and perhaps he has chosen the dreamer because he is an expert in this matter. Therefore he must help that person and put an end to that person’s confusion. And whoever sees one of his brothers with short golden hair, it means that this The person will have a great status and will reach high positions. As for his short hair, it is a testimony to the loss that this person suffered in his journey and journey in this life. But in the end, he will reach the place of his dreams and will be very happy with his life. Interpretation of seeing short hair in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a vision Short hair in a dream of another person is a person, and that person's hair was red. This means that there is a major emotional change in this person's life and a greater possibility that he will suffer the loss of the person he loves. Which will make him suffer a lot, and he will feel very sad and hurt in his heart, and he will need Who will stand by his side and save him from this pain. Here, the only person who will help this person should be you and you should fully understand the situation he is going through. Umm

title: Interpretation of masturbation in a dream - seeing masturbation in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of masturbation in a dream of an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a single young man, or a married man according to Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq. Masturbation in a dream is one of the very disturbing dreams that we see in our dreams constantly, especially in the period of youth, due to constant thinking about sex and other things. It is one of the matters that concerns young people, women and men, and is difficult for them. Interpreting the vision in an easy way, because of the confusion that occurs in the dreamer if the vision is told, and the vision carries many important meanings and connotations that the dreamer must know and interpret correctly. We will explain to you the interpretation of masturbation in a dream to all dream interpreters around the world, which has been interpreted correctly and completely. So that you know what the dream holds for the dreamer. Interpretation of masturbation in a dream Masturbation (i.e. one who has intercourse with oneself) indicates waste and indicates committing sins and disobeying God, or it may be a dream about washing and purifying oneself from it. Seeing masturbation with ejaculation, that is, the release of semen, has no explanation for it. It has no specific meaning. Masturbation refers to hidden issues that the dreamer has that occupy him and that he does not want to reveal, whether they are material or moral. Masturbation for single people or single women is often the result of psychological pressure or over-thinking about an intimate relationship or marriage. Stress can be Caused by study or passion is a reason for this symbol to appear in the dreams of young people. Masturbation can indicate concealing or concealing repressed feelings from others. Masturbation can also be interpreted as immoral behavior and can also indicate waste. Masturbating or seeing a known person masturbating, it may lead to This is due to the secrets of the person who does this act, and these secrets do not want to be revealed to people. The practice of masturbation may indicate that sensual, moral, and emotional desires are not satisfied in reality. Interpretation of masturbation for unmarried people. A dream about masturbation for both men and women can be interpreted as simple stress and psychological exhaustion that arises from the idea Marriage and intimate relationships. It could also be the result of sexual desire and lust that may precede this dream. If this is not the case, then it is pressure and problems in academic or emotional matters. Interpretation of masturbation for married people. Anyone who is married and sees himself masturbating in his dream is evidence of the many difficulties and problems he faces in his life and work. It can also be a result of suppressing many worries and sorrows and hiding them from the family. Interpretation of masturbation in a dream by Ibn Sirin If you see yourself masturbating in a dream or dream, this indicates hidden and repressed sexual desires within you. This dream can also indicate the need to take care of yourself on a level Psychological and emotional, which means you need to work on improving your spirit and keeping your morale high. And if you were in a relationship with someone at the time you saw masturbation in a dream, it means that you should make an effort to improve your relationship with your partner. If you have been

This dream can also indicate the need to take care of yourself on a level Psychological and emotional, which means you need to work on improving your spirit and keeping your morale high. And if you were in a relationship with someone at the time you saw masturbation in a dream, it means that you should make an effort to improve your relationship with your partner. If you have been

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dog biting me, meaning that a dog bites me in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dog bite in a dream means temptation, fraud, and other interpretations. We will explain this to a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man, and a single man, for example. I also dreamed of a black dog biting me, or a white or brown dog chasing me, or a small puppy attacking me and chasing me, according to Ibn Sirin and others on the topic: Interpretation of a dog bite in a dream. The vision appears of a dog bite in a dream. For the one who has the vision, he is facing some problems, and therefore it will negatively affect his life, and seeing a dog Bite you in a dream means the continuous attempts of your enemies to harm you. This vision also generally shows the adversities and problems that friends, enemies and competitors may face in the dreamer’s life, so seeing a dog bite in a dream indicates the unfortunate events that he will be exposed to, but in the end he will be able to. Overcoming everything. But when you are exposed to a dog bite and a stream of blood in a dream, the interpretation of the dream is completely canceled. A dog bites someone on the leg in a dream shows his inability to go on the trip that he wanted so much. A dog bites his hand in a dream. It also indicates obtaining prohibited money. A dog bites his head in a dream. It seems that you You think about bad things. The vision also shows that the visionary does not care about his religious values ​​and principles, and he also violates the paths that lead to the path of justice and peace. He is a person who loves comfort, mood, and money. Seeing a dog biting the fortuneteller shows that he has committed many mistakes and transgressions, and he can achieve To the torment and sorrow of others, as it appears that his enemies and competitors will be able to harm him. If someone dreams that he is a dog that bites him, then if he is accompanied by heresy, then he will be tempted, and if he has an enemy or competitor, then he will curse him or defeat him, and if he has a slave who betrays him or betrays him. The guard who betrayed him, and if it was in a time of famine, takes something from him, then the amount of a bite is enough for him to suffer. A dog bites a human being in a dream. It states that he is in a relationship with an unfit woman because he exposes false statements and rumours. He will marry her and her different nature will affect the family and therefore they will not be able to create a life. Successful family. If the dog is small, this indicates that the owner of the vision is nourished by good offspring. Relief doors. But if the dog is black, he will get a lot of help from the family, especially regarding materials. For a dog that runs, it indicates great financial gains and a happy and comfortable life. A dog attack in a dream. The vision is exposed to harm and damage from enemies and competitors, as it expresses his argument in life, and his complete protection from himself who orders evil and works to purify it. When a dog attacks in a dream, it shows overcoming Against enemies and finding complete refuge from evil friends. A person bites a dog in a dream and expresses the ability of insight to defeat his enemies and competitors, and to overcome all the problems and bad situations that he suffered in previous periods, to bring him closer to God Almighty, and to defeat his enemies who will be in power. There is no god but God, when all bite him

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about armpit hair from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about armpit hair: It is considered one of the controversial topics whose interpretation varies depending on the person of the monarch and the circumstances and events revolving around him. A dream about armpit hair, if it is long, indicates negligence and defects committed by that person in relation to his religion. The meaning also indicates the many worries and problems that burden him. Shaving his armpit hair in a dream is a sign of the hopes he obtains and the reward he will achieve in his life, and God knows best. And shaving it expresses his intentions for a close marriage and the debts that have been paid. Interpretation of a dream about armpit hair by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that a dream about armpit hair is evidence of an inability to The dreamer achieves his goal. The meaning also indicates the failure that he causes in God’s laws and laws. Removing it by plucking, according to Ibn Sirin, is an indication of the goals and purposes that it foretells. Seeing long hair reaching the ends of the earth is evidence of the misfortunes that befell him and the trials that he goes through, and God I know. Interpretation of a dream about armpit hair for a single woman. Armpit hair for single women if they have undergone many experiences in their lives that negatively affect them and affect their psychological state. The interpretation explains in another place what she does by ignoring the laws and rulings of her religion, so she must correct her conditions before the day comes when there is no effect. For sadness. Removing it in a dream is a sign that he will overcome all the difficulties and tragic situations he faces. The length of her armpit hair also symbolizes her vulgar characteristics that make her annoying to everyone who deals with her. Interpretation of a dream about armpit hair for a married woman. The interpretation shows that this woman suffers from envy and the crises that she is going through. With it. The armpit hair of a married woman is evidence of the constant disputes and battles that she experienced with her husband. The meaning expresses the sins and transgressions that she committed. Watching it for an unusually long time shows her inability to bear the burdens that come in her way. Shaving her armpit hair in her dream is a sign that You will overcome the symptoms of the things you are going through. Interpretation of a dream about armpit hair for a pregnant woman. Long armpit hair for a pregnant woman expresses her neglect of the Sunnah and the duties of her religion. Its appearance in a dream is a sign of difficult things and unfortunate events that await it. The meaning in another country shows the discomfort that you feel during pregnancy and childbirth. Shaving her hair in her dream is evidence of the ease of childbirth and the end of all the pain she feels. Interpretation of a dream about armpit hair for a divorced woman. The month of a divorced woman’s long armpit indicates the happiness and psychological stability she feels in remaining behind God in the bitter days and hours. Removing her hair is evidence of her efforts to achieve her ambitions. Shaving hair from another angle expresses her firm desire to return to her ex-husband and restore the friendship between them. The meaning also symbolizes a lack of religious commitment and a violation of the correct approach. Interpretation of a dream about armpit hair for a man: A dream about a man’s armpit hair is a warning bell about the sins he is committing. Seeing long hair is an indication of... The challenges he faces, causing him a lot of psychological pain and making him feel helpless. The dream is good news about what will happen in terms of repentance and...

title: Interpretation of a dream about scorched earth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about scorched earth in a dream. Through the following lines, we will show you how important it is to see scorched earth in a dream and what this indicates in reality. Interpretation of a dream of scorched earth in a dream If a married man sees well-cultivated land in a dream, this means that he will receive abundant money, and if a married woman sees this, this indicates The good that you will receive in the coming period. Seeing scorched earth for a pregnant woman in a dream also indicates that childbirth will be easy. If a girl sees a bowl of scorched earth in a dream, this indicates kindness and fulfillment of desires. Interpretation of a dream about seeing harvesting green crops in a dream. If a married man sees in a dream that he is harvesting crops Green, this is a sign of longevity. Seeing a married woman harvesting green crops in a dream means health and safety. While harvesting green crops on an unexpected date in a dream indicates stress and sadness. It also indicates bad things that happen to the person who sees. Interpretation of a dream about plowing the road in a dream. If the dreamer dreams that he is plowing the road, This may indicate progress in achieving some goals. When the path is not straight, it shows the difficulties that the dreamer faces in reaching his goal. Also, if the road is difficult in the dream, this may indicate that you will face problems and fears. While seeing a paved road in a dream indicates achieving goals. In an easy way, interpreting a dream about harvesting yellow wheat in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin indicated that harvesting yellow wheat in a dream indicates the goodness of the intelligent person and his livelihood. A man’s vision of yellow wheat also indicates the huge amounts of money he obtains, and if a married woman sees this as evidence of achieving goals and desires, the general girl who sees Yellow wheat in a dream indicates excellence in study, work, or achieving goals. Interpretation of a dream about harvesting dry crops in a dream. If the dreamer sees dry crops in a dream, this is a sign of a person losing and dying. Likewise, if a married woman sees a dry crop in a dream, this is a sign that she is suffering from losses. When you see a pregnant woman, this may indicate a difficult problem facing her pregnancy. It also shows the common girl the hardships and problems that she will suffer in the future. Interpretation of a dream about plowing the land with an ax in a dream. If a man is seen plowing the land with an ax in a dream, it may mean that the man is looking for money and effort. Seeing a common girl is not a person You know him plowing the land in a dream indicates the imminent marriage of this young man or his attempt to bring money to marry the girl. It also indicates to the married woman the kindness and livelihood she gets. It can also indicate the efforts made by women and their children for a good upbringing. Interpretation of a dream of plowing the land with a tractor in a dream. Seeing Yourself plowing the land with a tractor in a dream indicates an attempt to make money. If a married man dreams that he is plowing the land with a tractor in a dream, this is evidence of the effort he is making at work. Seeing a married woman also indicates the great effort she is making at work and learning.

title: Interpretation of a dream about roses in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about roses in a dream on our website Moments Roses are one of the most beautiful gifts that can be given on any occasion, whether it is an engagement, wedding, birthday, or other occasions. Red, violet, pink and many other colors, but all of these colors are in our reality, so seeing roses in our dreams has the same interpretation and the same happiness and joy, or dream interpreters have another opinion on this vision, this we will deal with in detail through this article. Interpretation of a dream Seeing roses by Ibn Sirin The leading scholars and dream interpreters have reached the conclusion that roses in dreams indicate love, loyalty, and honesty in general. Whoever sees in a dream that he is offering roses to his parents or one of his brothers, this is evidence of kinship and a strong family relationship. As for whoever sees a wilted rose in his dream This is a sign of illness or failure. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is watering roses, this is evidence that the dreamer is doing a good deed. Interpretation of the dream of seeing roses by Nabulsi. Nabulsi mentioned about the dreamer who sees himself picking roses, this is evidence that he will receive love and affection from those around him. As for whoever sees himself smelling the scent of yellow roses, this indicates that he is kissing a sick woman. Interpretation of a dream about roses for single women. Roses in general in an unmarried woman’s dream are evidence and evidence that she has pure emotion and also indicate joy and pleasure for the dreamer. If an unmarried woman sees roses White in her dream, this means that the dreamer will propose marriage to her, and he is a person with morals and kindness. However, if an unmarried woman sees in her dream a red rose with thorns, wounds, or scratches, this is a sign and warning to the woman from the vision that someone is approaching her, causing her injury. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is sleeping next to roses, this indicates happiness and love. However, if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is picking roses, this is evidence that she will reap the fruits of her love through marriage or knowing success. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is picking roses, this is evidence that she will reap the fruits of her love through marriage or knowing success. If a married woman sees roses in her dream and suffers from problems and crises, this indicates optimism, hope, and the near end of crises and problems. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband gives her roses A gift, this indicates that there is a problem between her and her husband, and this is evidence of reconciliation. But if a married woman sees white roses in her dream, this is a sign of the loss of anxiety and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about roses for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees white roses in her dream, this is a sign that she She will give birth without problems and pain and her child will be healthy. But if a pregnant woman sees a single rose in her dream, this is a sign that she will give birth to a female. But if the pregnant woman sees that someone gave her a gift of roses, this is evidence of her friendship with her. Giving roses to someone is also As a gift from a pregnant woman, it also indicates the existence of a relationship between the person being seen and this person. But if a pregnant woman sees it in a dream
